title: Honey Grilled Pork Tenderloin- Jada
directions: Trim fat. Make lengthwise cut to within 1/4" of other side (butterfly).
Place in Ziploc bag with marinade for 3 hours.
Grill and brush with sauce. Cook 10 minutes,
turn, brush with sauce, and cook 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 t dark sesame oil (Sometimes this is tricky to find. Trader Joeâ€™s generally
Cook over low heat until sugar is dissolved.
(We often double the sauce, particularly if the tenderloins are Costco-size.)
